name: io.cordova.sandfilltetris
description:
Sandfill Tetris is a creative twist on classic Tetris where pieces behave like falling sand instead of rigid blocks.
Instead of neatly stacking shapes, the fragments crumble and flow into gaps, creating unpredictable, organic patterns.
The goal remains to fill lines and score points, but the physics-driven mechanics add a fresh, chaotic challenge.
author: LitePix Team
